channel.title: CVE Feed for PluginEver -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PluginEver -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-45053|2024-08-02T20:14:19.312Z -- pluginever -- wp%20content%20pilot%20%E2%80%93%20autoblogging%20%26%20affiliate%20marketing%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in pluginever WP Content Pilot – Autoblogging & Affiliate Marketing Plugin allows Code Injection.This issue affects WP Content Pilot – Autoblogging & Affiliate Marketing Plugin: from n/a through 1.3.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-46078|2024-08-02T20:37:39.651Z -- pluginever -- wc%20serial%20numbers
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in PluginEver WC Serial Numbers plugin <= 1.6.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-45053|2024-06-04T20:19:43.910Z -- pluginever -- wp%20content%20pilot%20%E2%80%93%20autoblogging%20%26%20affiliate%20marketing%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in pluginever WP Content Pilot – Autoblogging & Affiliate Marketing Plugin allows Code Injection.This issue affects WP Content Pilot – Autoblogging & Affiliate Marketing Plugin: from n/a through 1.3.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-35173|2024-06-04T17:34:28.084Z -- pluginever -- serial%20numbers%20for%20woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20license%20manager
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in PluginEver Serial Numbers for WooCommerce – License Manager.This issue affects Serial Numbers for WooCommerce – License Manager: from n/a through 1.7.3.
